title: Chicken Meatballs in Port Fig Sauce
directions: Place meatballs in a 3 1/2- or 4-quart slow cooker. For sauce, in a medium bowl combine port, the water, figs, tapioca, and rosemary. Pour sauce over meatballs.
Cover and cook on low-heat setting for 3 to 4 hours or on high-heat setting for 1 1/2 to 2 hours. Stir to coat meatballs with sauce.
Serve immediately or keep warm, covered, on warm- or low-heat setting for up to 2 hours. Use toothpicks or cocktail picks for serving.
ingredients: 4 12 ounce packages cooked chicken meatballs with caramelized onion (Aidells)
